ticketDetails.subject: My resubscribe button is not working
ticketDetails.description: When a user tries to resubscribe to my blog, they can't use the resubscribe button form email. They ahve to go to my website

img.alt: picture of resubscribe button in newsletter

communications.message: Hi Tammy, my name is Craig. I can help you with this. Can you give me your blog's name?
Hi Craig, yes, my blog is tammyturfs.com.
Great. Now could you give me your mailchimp username?

ticketDetails.subject: Unable to Access Account
ticketDetails.description: Hi there, I am unable to get back into my account. I tried resetting my password but did not get the verificatioon email.

communications.message: Hi Julie, my name is Joe. I can help you with this. Can you give me your blog's name?
Hi Joe, yes, my blog is juliesjules.com.
Hi Julie, I've just reviewed your account and found that you have another email on file. Is it possible the verification went to juliesjules@emails.com
Hi Joe, my mistake, you are correct. It went to my other email. Thanks!

ticketDetails.subject: Cancel Subscription
ticketDetails.description: Hi I have a subscriber that is trying to cancel their susbscription but says the cancel button is not working.

communications.message: Hi Tammy, my name is Joe. I can help you with this. Can you give me your blog's name?
Hi Joe, yes, my blog is tammyturfs.com.
Great. I've just reviewed your page and fixed the cancel button. Let me know if you ahve any mroe issues with it.

ticketDetails.subject: Subscribers can't access Paypal
ticketDetails.description: Hi there, some of my subscribers are having issues using Paypal to subscribe to my channel.

communications.message: Hi Julie, my name is Craig. Unfortunately, Paypal can only be used as a method of payment in the USA. That may be why only some of your subscribers ar having this issue.
Hi Joe, I think one of them is from te US actually.
Hi Julie, please get the to contact us at support and we'll be able to guide them.
Hi Joe, I will tell them and put it on my blog. Do you know when Paypal will be availble internationally?
